body.p: Our dictionary is now on the web.

You may also use our word- and text analysis tools. If you write or paste in some Sámi text, and chooses translation, you will get a basic translation of the base forms (but not a translation of the sentence, and no info on the use of the words).
Parts of our resources are beta versions. This means that there may be errors in them. Feel free to send us corrections and suggestions for improvement! (oahpa@hum.uit.no)

ul.li: Word translation. If you choose "Translation to Norwegian", you will get the Norwegian translation of the base forms.
